text: Colobothea strigosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1865. It is known from Argentina and Brazil.BioLib.cz - Colobothea strigosa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1865
title: Colobothea strigosa
